name: Not gonna work
description:
Game title: Not Gonna Work

Release Date: 31/01/2019

Developed by: Brian Kim

Platform: PC Only

Price: NZD 69.99

File Size: 4.60 MB

Contact Detail: zzong11242@gmail.com

Availability: Digital Download

 

Not Gonna Work is a 2D escape game where you control a perfectly healthy old man who thinks he should not be working at his age. You can interact with objects in the shop to solve some issues and find the key to escape.

Special Thanks to: Dad

This game was inspired by my dad.

While I was working for him in his restaurant. He used to magically disappear when I take my eyes off him for 5 minutes. 

Thanks Dad!
